inclusion.criterion: Primary hypothyroidism on stable dose of L-T4 for > 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal TSH level on usual dose of L-T4
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No acute or chronic medical or psychiatric illnesses that affect thyroid function, mood or cognition
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No medication use that affects thyroid function, mood or cognition (oral contraceptives or estrogen therapy allowed)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal score on screening Mini-Mental State Exam (MMSE) (to test for dementia)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Inability to speak and comprehend English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A history of coronary artery disease
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is on Levothyroxine. She has a history of coronary artery disease.
